name: Linkbelt Wall Dragon
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by its own effect. When you Link Summon: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, place 2 counters on it. Neither player can Link Summon a monster with a higher Link Rating than the number of counters on this card. Monsters cannot attack, except Link Monsters. If a monster is Link Summoned: Remove 2 counters from this card. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase: Place 1 counter on this card.
